ios.ios.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app does not directly use the camera. The document picker feature may access the camera to scan documents.
ios.ios.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app may access your photo library to select documents or images through the document picker.
ios.ios.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app does not use the microphone. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app does not use location services. This permission may be requested by advertising libraries.
ios.ios.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app does not use Bluetooth. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app does not access your contacts. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app does not access your calendar. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app does not access your reminders. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app does not use motion data. This permission may be requested by third-party libraries.
ios.ios.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app does not use Face ID. This permission may be requested by payment processing libraries.
